sections.title: Manage and regulate difficult emotions
sections.description: Emotion regulation teaches you how to manage intense feelings without being overwhelmed. We use these skills when emotions feel too big or don't match the situation. These techniques help you change unwanted emotions, reduce their intensity, and respond thoughtfully rather than reactively to emotional experiences.

skills.title: Check the Facts
skills.description: Determine if your emotional response fits the situation and intensity.

skills.title: Chain Analysis
skills.description: Understand the triggers and sequence of events, emotions, and urges that led to challenging situations.

skills.title: Self-Care (PLEASE)
skills.description: Take care of your body to regulate emotions using PLEASE: treat Physical illness, balance Eating, avoid mood-Altering substances, balance Sleep, and get Exercise

skills.title: Dialectical Thinking
skills.description: Learn to hold two seemingly opposite truths at the same time - both/and instead of either/or

skills.title: Problem Solving
skills.description: Systematic approach to solving problems when you can change the situation
